column4: i wanted to get your guys opinions, if I am going to store a list of numbers in a flat file, what do you think is the best way to store it, each number by line, or 1 line seperated by a comma, 2nd question, if i wanted to compare 2 files to see which numbers are in both, how would you recommend I do it?
